tasks.label: Compile and Run C++ (PowerShell)
args: & { g++ -std=c++17 '${file}' -o '${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe'; if ($?) { Get-Content '${fileDirname}\input.txt' | & '${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe' | Out-File -Encoding ASCII '${fileDirname}\output.txt'; Write-Host 'Finished! Check output.txt' } }
